objective: Generate realistic test data, fixtures, and factories for testing purposes.
instructions: 1. Analyze data models and their relationships. 2. Create factory classes/functions for each model. 3. Generate realistic fake data using appropriate libraries (Faker, Factory Boy, etc.). 4. Create fixture sets for different test scenarios: - Minimal data set for unit tests - Comprehensive data set for integration tests - Edge case data (special characters, unicode, large values) 5. Ensure referential integrity in related data. 6. Create seed scripts for development databases. 7. Document data dependencies and relationships.
data_patterns: - Factory pattern for dynamic test data creation - Fixture files for static test data (JSON, YAML) - Builders for complex object construction - Traits for common variations - Sequences for unique values - Lazy attributes for computed values
output_format: Generate files including: - Factory definitions (factories/user_factory.py) - Fixture files (fixtures/users.json) - Seed scripts (scripts/seed_db.py) - Test data constants (tests/constants.py) - Data builder utilities
